title: Who We Are
text: We seek to provide STEM students at CSM the opportunity to stirr their creativity and aplly their engineering skills in robotics projects that are chosen by all club members. We welcome students with different skill levels and interests, and we hope to build a warm and accomplished community of creators.

title: Get Involved
text: We meet once a week at The Makerspace at Library, and we try our best to schedule the most accesible meeting time for all members. If you are ready to join, email us and let us know your available time! Question? Click the button!
